# Anyscale & Ray 101

This template provides an introduction to Anyscale & Ray. We will begin by running a simple Ray application, exploring [tasks](https://docs.ray.io/en/latest/ray-core/tasks.html) and their scalability. Finally, we will conclude by submitting a basic [Anyscale Job](https://docs.anyscale.com/productionize/jobs/get-started), all within a quick 2 minutes!

Let's dive in and explore the power of Anyscale and Ray together.

![Anyscale](data:image/png;base64,)![Ray](data:image/png;base64,)
